title: Cosmic Byte ARES Wired Controller for PC, Magnetic Triggers, Accurate Joysticks, Dual Vibration, Backit LED Buttons (White)
features: Ergonomic Design and Rubbersied Textured Sticks for enhanced Grip
Pressure Sensitive Analog Triggers and LED Backlit Buttons. Supports Xinput and D Input
Vibration Feature and Zero Lag connection using USB cable
Turbo and Auto Turbo Buttons for on the fly customizations
1.8 meter USB cable so comfortablly sit on the couch to game
